title: Alik Bahshi
author: Alik Bahshi
content: Alik BahshiInternational Committee of the Red Cross and smuggling    At the Azerbaijani border checkpoint in the city of Lachin, a large consignment of smuggled goods, including sanctioned goods, namely packs of cigarettes and mobile phones, was found, which Armenians tried to smuggle from Armenia in Red Cross vehicles to the territory of Karabakh, which is under the temporary control of Russian peacekeepers. That such a humanitarian organization as the International Committee of the Red Cross, instead of medicines and medical supplies, would be engaged in the transport of cigarettes in commercial quantities, cigarettes recognized as harmful to health, causes Homeric laughter. The Armenian workers of the Red Cross have discredited this authoritative international organization. Now it becomes clear why Armenia was against the creation of a customs post in Lachin and even filed a lawsuit with the International Court of Justice about the illegality of creating a border checkpoint located on the territory of Azerbaijan. Naturally, the court could in no way be satisfied with such impudence on the part of Armenia and the claim was dismissed.   07/11/2023
